name: Tales of the Dragons
description:
Okay so this project is not finished.

We're releasing it as a demo for now and plan to upload the finished game later! 

As I'm taking care of a baby and mjaosemjao is working on a tv production we haven't had much time to spend on this jam but we have had fun nonetheless! ^0^ 

This game is like a parody of classic anime/jrpg stories, it's not very serious. 

Controls

Arrows to move, Space or Enter to confirm, Esc for menu ( and to go back in menu)

Credits

Morgis: Story, game dev, putting stuff together

https://mjaosemjao.itch.io/: Story, music and sound effects

Other music files are from freesound.org: sonically_sound, szegvari, Migfus20, SieuAmThanh and Sirkoto51

Portraits of chars are from RTP and borrowed from pinterest as placeholders.
